means: 扁桃体( tonsil的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: I had my tonsils out when I was ten.
sentence.Network_cn: 我10岁的时候把扁桃体切除了.

sentence.Network_en: The doctor cut out his tonsils.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生切除了他的扁桃体.

sentence.Network_en: The tonsils become fiery red and swollen.

last Friday night , she got a very high fever , and it happened on Saturday too . I took her to see doctor on Sunday , it is Acute inflammation of the tonsils .上周五晚上开始发高烧，周六又发了一天，周日带她去医院，是扁桃体脓肿。
OK . we want you to get better , too . you'll have your tonsils out tomorrow , and you won't get so many colds any more .好吧。我们也希望你身体好起来。你明天就要切除扁桃体了，以后你就不会这么经常的感冒了。

list.abs: 咽扁桃体（pharyngeal tonsil）： 表面被覆假复层纤毛柱状上皮，无隐窝，粘膜形成一些纵行皱襞，固有层内有淋巴小结和弥散淋巴组 …
腭扁桃体（palatine tonsil）：  是最大的一对扁桃体，呈卵圆形，左、右各一，位于腭舌弓与腭咽弓之间凹窝内（参见图5－4），即通 …
慢性扁桃体炎（chronic　tonsillitis）多由急性扁桃体炎反复发作演变而来。按其病变可分为：1．慢性肥大性扁桃体炎扁桃体呈不同程 …
tonsil haemostatic forceps 扁桃体止血钳tonsil knife 扁桃体刀tonsil ligature forceps 扁桃体结扎钳

entry.def: Your tonsils are the two small soft lumps in your throat at the back of your mouth.
